analysis.description:
IcoManagement.withdraw_funds (/unique_chucks/6/0xbeada3257bff2d41ef6e563190e6624b57eacc89.sol#85-90) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(amount) (/unique_chucks/6/0xbeada3257bff2d41ef6e563190e6624b57eacc89.sol#89-90)

IcoManagement.withdraw_all_funds (/unique_chucks/6/0xbeada3257bff2d41ef6e563190e6624b57eacc89.sol#90-95) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(this.balance) (/unique_chucks/6/0xbeada3257bff2d41ef6e563190e6624b57eacc89.sol#94)

IcoManagement.invest (/unique_chucks/6/0xbeada3257bff2d41ef6e563190e6624b57eacc89.sol#56-69) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(_to,token_amount) (/unique_chucks/6/0xbeada3257bff2d41ef6e563190e6624b57eacc89.sol#68)

IcoManagement.fract_price should be constant (/unique_chucks/6/0xbeada3257bff2d41ef6e563190e6624b57eacc89.sol#12)
IcoManagement.icoEndTime should be constant (/unique_chucks/6/0xbeada3257bff2d41ef6e563190e6624b57eacc89.sol#15)
IcoManagement.icoStartTime should be constant (/unique_chucks/6/0xbeada3257bff2d41ef6e563190e6624b57eacc89.sol#14)
IcoManagement.ico_rejected should be constant (/unique_chucks/6/0xbeada3257bff2d41ef6e563190e6624b57eacc89.sol#24-25)
IcoManagement.minCap should be constant (/unique_chucks/6/0xbeada3257bff2d41ef6e563190e6624b57eacc89.sol#19-20)
IcoManagement.min_inv should be constant (/unique_chucks/6/0xbeada3257bff2d41ef6e563190e6624b57eacc89.sol#18-19)
IcoManagement.price should be constant (/unique_chucks/6/0xbeada3257bff2d41ef6e563190e6624b57eacc89.sol#11)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/6/0xbeada3257bff2d41ef6e563190e6624b57eacc89.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.15 (/unique_chucks/6/0xbeada3257bff2d41ef6e563190e6624b57eacc89.sol#1): it allows old versions
